name: 2048X AI - 2048 with AI solver
description:
Feel bored with common 2048 UI?
Feel bored with 4*4 board size?
Want to undo a accidental swipe? Want to see an AI solve 2048 in action?

Try 2048X AI

2048 with old style.
Swipe to move all tiles and get to 2048 tile.

Features:
1, New old style for 2048 game.
2, AI (artificial intelligence), run 2048 game automatically and see AI in action. (Four different AI algorithms)
3, Different board size, from 2*2 to 12*12
4, Undo function, give you another chance for an accidental swipe

Tips: to open option menu, long press "Run AI" button.
